content.title: Post Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme For University Rank Holders At Under-Graduate Level Applicable
content.beneficiary: University rank holders at the undergraduate level
content.details: University Grants Commission (UGC), Department of Higher Education (DoHE) introduced a Post-Graduate Merit Scholarship Scheme for University rank holders both in General and Honours Courses at the Undergraduate level. The scholarship may be tenable for a period of two years to enable the rank holders of each university at the undergraduate level to pursue their Master’s Degree. The purpose of this scheme is to attract talent for pursuing postgraduate studies besides strengthening the basic subjects – General as well as Honours, at the Undergraduate level.
benefits: Each awardee will be provided a scholarship of ₹ 2,000/- p.m. for a period of two years.
Total number of scholarships in the first academic year would be 1800 for General Courses and 575 for Honours Courses.
eligibility: First and Second Rank holders at UG level in General Courses.
First Rank holders in Honours Courses.
Minimum of 60% marks at the undergraduate level.
Regular, full-time Master’s Degree course in any recognized university or postgraduate college.
Age limit of 30 years at the time of admission to the PG course.
exclusions: Professional courses are not covered under the scheme.
Distance mode of education is not covered under the scheme.
content.application_process: Applications are invited through online mode once a year through advertisements in leading newspapers and Employment News. The selection is made on the basis of merit and as per the procedure of the Commission.
documents_required: Attested copy of university undergraduate degree.
Verification certificate by the institute where students have taken admitted to Ist Year P.G. Course.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of This Scheme?
faqs.answer: To promote and nurture talent, reward meritorious students, promote study in basic subjects, and build up academic excellence at the postgraduate level.

faqs.question: What Will Be The Tenure Of The Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The scholarship may be tenable for a period of two years.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme Only Apply To Those Pursuing Post-Graduate Programs?
faqs.answer: Yes, the awardees can pursue their Postgraduate program in any area of specialization.

faqs.question: What Is The Amount Of Financial Assistance Provided In This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Each awardee will be provided a scholarship of ₹ 2,000/- p.m. for a period of two years.

faqs.question: Is This Scholarship Subject To Securing A Minimum Of Marks At The Undergraduate Level?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scholarship is subject to securing a minimum of 60% marks.

faqs.question: Is There An Age Criterion For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the age limit for the students is 30 years at the time of admission.
